p: The doses of garlic oil and onion oil used in our study were sufficient to obtain the physiological benefits without any side effects. As shown in Fig. 1, histological liver analyses revealed that the rats fed an HFD had severe infiltrations of inflammatory cells (Fig. 1 ② and ③), whereas the basal diet-fed rats exhibited normal and healthy histochemical structures (Fig. 1 ①). Additionally, the rats in the garlic oil and onion oil groups had greatly reduced infiltrations of inflammatory cells (from ④ to ⑧ in Fig. 1) compared with the HFD group. In conclusion, garlic oil and onion oil could play important roles in altering body fat and regulating lipid metabolism.
